Verse: We(Israelites)  are your(Yahweh’s) people. And you(Yahweh) treat us(Israelites) more kindly [than all of the other countries [that are on the earth]]. We(Israelites) are the only people [that you(Yahweh) chose [in order to become your(Yahweh’s) people]]. You(Yahweh) (implicit-info) did not choose other people. You(Yahweh) treat us(Israelites) kindly [so that other people could know your(Yahweh's) name]. And you(Yahweh) did great miracles for us(Israelites). [When we(Israelites) came to this land] you(Yahweh) went in front of us(Israelites). And you(Yahweh) forced [the other nations to leave this land]. You(Yahweh) also forced [those nations' gods to leave this land]. And you(Yahweh) saved/rescued us(Israelites) [when we(Yahweh) were slaves in Egypt].
